item.title: Consultation Hours
item.description:
As of 19th October 2017 (WS 2017 / 18) consultation hours with Prof. Lessmann will take place as follows:

all students on Thursday 10 - 11 am.

Because of the great demand, appointments will be given only with previous registration by sending an e-mail to bujarek@hu-berlin.de.

item.title: Open three year PhD Position
item.description:
We seek applications for a three year PhD position (0.75 E13) in Bereich Credit Risk Analytics.

Please send your application by email to Prof. Lessmann.(Deadline: 09.02.2018)
